sections.title: Furious Guardian (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Furious Guardian class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Chosen Ally (Ex) (Furious Guardian)
sections.description: When entering rage, designate an ally as a free action and grant them AC and Reflex save bonuses while adjacent by taking an AC penalty. The bonus scales at 5th and 10th level.

sections.title: Guard Dedications (Furious Guardian)
sections.description: Selectable specializations gained at 1st level and every 2 levels thereafter, providing various combat, defensive, and tactical abilities. Includes options like Alert Guardian, Formal Training, Rage Power, and Teamwork.

sections.title: Rage (Ex) (Furious Guardian)
sections.description: Functions as the barbarian rage ability, with class levels stacking with other rage-granting classes for determining rage powers and daily rounds. Focused on defending allies in combat.

sections.title: Guarded Thoughts (Ex) (Furious Guardian)
sections.description: Provides an additional saving throw with +5 circumstance bonus against charm or compulsion effects that would force attacking the chosen ally. Usable once per effect.

sections.title: Adaptable Guardian (Ex) (Furious Guardian)
sections.description: Allows changing the chosen ally during rage as a move action at 4th level, improving to a swift action at 8th level.

sections.title: Tight Follower (Ex) (Furious Guardian)
sections.description: When the chosen ally moves more than 10 feet away, move up to your speed as an immediate action to stay within 10 feet of them.

sections.title: Reactive Strike (Ex) (Furious Guardian)
sections.description: Make an attack of opportunity against enemies that move adjacent to or attack your chosen ally. Limited to one reactive strike per creature per round.

sections.title: Unbreakable Defender (Ex) (Furious Guardian)
sections.description: While within 10 feet of chosen ally, gain Die Hard feat benefits and no longer become fatigued when rage ends.
